world

Class Shield

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.Sprite
      • world.Shield

  • public class Shield
extends Sprite
    The Shield class provides a layer of protection for Circles in game.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Brian, Robbie, Josh
